price: 11. Mpe soki bayebisi bango bobebisa te okati ya mokili, bakolobaka ete: Ya sôló biso tozali babongisi.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَا تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا نَحۡنُ مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum lā tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi qālū innamā naḥnu muṣ'liḥūna
